steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Proofing' group, click on the 'Spelling & Grammar' button.
The 'Spelling and Grammar' pane will appear on the right side of the document.
Click on the 'Dictionary' button in the 'Spelling and Grammar' pane.
The 'Custom Dictionaries' dialog box will open.
Select the dictionary you want to edit from the list.
Click on the 'Edit Word List' button.
The 'Edit Word List' dialog box will open.
Add, remove, or modify words in the dictionary as needed.
Click 'OK' to save the changes and close the dialog box.
